Spells:
Command (Toil1 Ench): R75' Target obeys self commands to approach, drop, fall, flee, or halt (DC 13 Will neg) for 1 rd

Statue (Toil8 Tran): Touched becomes statue at will for 20 hr
Stone Shape (Toil3 Tran): Self reshapes 30' cu of stone
Telepathic Bond (Thought5 Divi): R75' Self and/or 6 willing targets in 15' diameter share thoughts for 200 min
Waves Of Exhaustion (Toil7 Necr): Creatures in 60' cone become exhausted
Waves Of Fatigue (Toil5 Necr): Creatures in 30' cone become fatigued
